https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pYmVCsVEEDnsvyqQBzDjC3DZxkL.jpg This is a live projection event for two 16mm projectors and two loudspeakers. The material in Cycles (1972/77) is recycled for two screens and two soundtracks, with one screen set inside another, giving rise to a surprising induced colours and rhythmic patterns. Cycles #3
